### Description
We need to expose many more fields to the JSON output.  The Cadillac solution would be to create a new toml section that allows the user to dynamically add/remove the fields that they want output to JSON/CSV.  The config file is located: `$PROJECT_ROOT/config/config.toml`.  The new file should look something like this:

```toml
[node]
# networkMode options:
# "mock": use MockP2PNetwork
# "hobbits": use HobbitsP2PNetwork
networkMode = "mock"
identity = "0x00"
timer="java"
networkInterface = "0.0.0.0"
port = 9000
advertisedPort = 9000

[sim]
numValidators = 16
numNodes = 1

[output]
nodeTime
index
slot
epoch
block_root
block.block_parent_root
block.slot
block.state_root
block.body.proposer_slashings[].proposer_index
block.body.proposer_slashings[].proposal_1.shard
block.body.attestations[].data.beacon_block_root
block.body.attestations[].data.justified_block_root
lastJustifiedBlockRoot
lastJustifiedStateRoot
lastFinalizedBlockRoot
lastFinalizedStateRoot
validators.balance

# Modify constants in Constants.java
[constants]
```
